sentences.en: A child's access to schooling varies greatly from area to area.
sentences.cn: 孩子获得学校教育的机会因地区不同而大相径庭.

sentences.en: Acceptance of women preachers varies greatly from denomination to denomination.
sentences.cn: 在接受女性传教士的问题上，不同教派的态度大相径庭。

sentences.en: All offers of help will be greatly appreciated .
Any assistance you could give the police will be greatly appreciated.
sentences.cn: 您提供的任何帮助警方都将万分感谢。

sentences.en: Casals greatly influenced later cellists with his technique, misicianship, and beautiful tone.
sentences.cn: 卡萨尔斯以他的表现手法和技巧 、 音乐家的风范及优美的曲调对以后的大提琴手产生很大影响.

sentences.en: Curiously, the struggle to survive has greatly improved her health.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，她拼命求生的抗争使得她的健康状况大有好转。

sentences.en: I am greatly indebted to you for your help.
sentences.cn: 我非常感激你对我的帮助.

sentences.en: I greatly esteem your message in the midst of our hard struggle.
sentences.cn: 您在我们奋力抗争时发来的电文让我充满了敬意。

sentences.en: Marx wrote back to say that Engels'praise had greatly encouraged him.
sentences.cn: 马克思回信给恩格斯说,他的赞誉对自己的鼓励很大.

sentences.en: Not unnaturally, Jane greatly resented Harry's interference.
sentences.cn: 很自然地，简对哈利的干预极为不满。

sentences.en: People's reaction to the film has varied greatly.
sentences.cn: 人们对这部影片的反应大不一样。

sentences.en: Running through the forest in the dark, the boys were greatly afraid.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在黑暗中穿过树林, 心里非常害怕.

sentences.en: Sharon was a wonderful lady and I know she'll be greatly missed.
sentences.cn: 莎伦是一位了不起的女士，我知道人们会非常想念她的。

sentences.en: The levels of tolerable pain vary greatly from individual to individual.
sentences.cn: 对疼痛的耐受程度因人而异，差别很大。

sentences.en: The quality of health care varies greatly .
sentences.cn: 医疗保健服务质量差别很大。

sentences.en: The worker operated the machine expertly; we admired him greatly.
sentences.cn: 那位工人操纵机器很熟练, 我们对他很钦佩.

sentences.en: There are two among their recent introductions that have greatly impressed me.
sentences.cn: 在他们最近引进的东西里面有两样给我留下了非常深刻的印象。

words.tran_cn: 伟大的，重大的；极好的，好的；主要的
